properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sauti ya Yohana,
ilisikika nyikani,
tengenezeni njia
Bwana apite. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Apite, apite,
Bwana apite,
Bwana apite,
tengenezeni njia
Bwana apite.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nyosheni mapitoni,
milima na mabonde,
tengenezeni njia
Bwana apite. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Na wewe kijana,
rekebisha mwenedo,
tengenezeni njia
Bwana apite. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sauti ya Yohana,
ilisikika jangwani,
tengenezeni njia
Bwana apite. x2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Sauti ya Isaya,
ikasikika ikisema,
tengenezeni njia
Bwana apite. x2

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Yohana akahubiri,
akihubiri injili,
tengenezeni njia
Bwana apite. x2
